name: Scary Bunny, Inc.
description: Scary Bunny, Inc. is an innovative entertainment company focused on creating immersive experiences in the realm of horror-themed gaming and media. Established in 2015, the company specializes in developing video games that blend thrilling narratives with interactive gameplay, captivating audiences of all ages. Scary Bunny has gained recognition for its flagship title, 'Horror Haven', which offers players a unique blend of psychological horror and action, along with stunning graphics and sound design. The company is also venturing into augmented reality (AR) experiences, allowing fans to engage with their favorite horror characters in real-world environments. With a strong emphasis on community engagement, Scary Bunny hosts fan conventions and online events to connect with its audience, fostering a dedicated fanbase. The company's mission is to push the boundaries of horror entertainment and create unforgettable experiences that resonate with players. Scary Bunny is continuously exploring new technologies and platforms to enhance its offerings, ensuring that it remains at the forefront of the entertainment industry.

seo.meta_title: Scary Bunny, Inc. | Horror Gaming and Entertainment
seo.meta_description: Explore Scary Bunny, Inc., a leader in horror-themed gaming and entertainment. Discover their innovative products and immersive experiences.

faq.question: What is Scary Bunny known for?
faq.answer: Scary Bunny is known for its immersive horror-themed video games and augmented reality experiences.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Scary Bunny?
faq.answer: Alice Johnson is the CEO of Scary Bunny, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Scary Bunny headquartered?
faq.answer: Scary Bunny is headquartered in Los Angeles, California, USA.

faq.question: What are Scary Bunny's main products?
faq.answer: Scary Bunny's main products include 'Horror Haven' and augmented reality horror experiences.
